about_the_game:
Divided Kingdoms combines multiple genres of strategy and role playing to form a unique experience of medieval strategy, warfare and role playing. You will have to master the art of building your faction on a local and global scale. Then you will have to master the art of dungeons and combat if you so wish. You can always just send in your armies instead. Only once you have mastered all of these elements can you remove the evil from your world and unite your now divided kingdom.





  • Single Player Campaign

  • Story Rich

  • Multiplayer Real Time Strategy

  • Rpg Chracters

  • Original Soundtrack

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains medieval battles and confrontations that contain blood, violence and foul language.

short_description: Divided Kingdoms is a multilayered medieval real time and turn based strategy with elements of role playing in the mix. You will have to unite your once mighty Kingdom and restore its former glory by overcoming challenges using strategy and skill.

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
